name: Ultra-hydrating Body Treatment
shortDescription: Many kinds of external factors have a negative impact on the skin.Poor diet, too little fluid intake, pollution are frequent causes ofdry, gray and the unpleasant feeling of roughness. Also, time affects the deteriorating condition of our skin. Our Ultra moisturizing treatment restores the natural softness and smoothness to yourskin. Hyaluronic acid and XERADIN™ provide excellent hydration.After the treatment, the skin is protected against irritation, external factors and roughness. Our treatment is suitable for all skin types.
description:
WASH GEL, NATURAL COLLAGEN SILVER 100 ML,COLLAGEN BODY LOTION

Procedure:

Wash your body with our Collagen Wash gel. Then gently apply the Natural Collagen Silver on moist skin and then pat in. Once bsorbed (approx. 5-10 min.) Apply and massage in the Collagen Body Lotion.

Application:

DURATION: 15 minutes
FREQUENCY: 1-2 a day
NUMBER OF TREATMENTS: 40

name: Rejuvenation Of Eyes Treatment
shortDescription: The skin around the eyes is very delicate and requires adequate and effective care. Always use preparations made only for this area ofthe face. Puffiness, dark circles under the eyes and so-called „crow’sfeet” are common symptoms of fatigue, lack of sleep, lack of essential vitamins and nutrients. Our selected treatments and products quickly restore a radiant, smooth and healthy appearance of the skin aroundthe eyes. Our innovative ingredient Eyeseryl® effectively eliminate sdark circles and puffiness around eyes, and Moist 24™ will provide the skin with intense hydration that will last up to 24 hours after treatment.
description:
FACIAL WASH GEL, COLLAGEN SERUM WITH VITAMINS A+E, UNDER EYE SERUM

PROCEDURE:

First wash the area around the eyes with our facial wash gel. Then gently apply and pat Collagen Serum with vitamins A + E. Once absorbed (approx. 5-10 min.) apply the Under Eye Serum.

APPLICATION:

Anti-wrinkle, eliminates swelling and lightens shadows under the eyes.

DURATION: 15 minutes
FREQUENCY: Once a day
NUMBER OF TREATMENTS: 30

name: Healthy Hair Treatment
shortDescription: Have ultra smooth and healthy looking hair thanks to our Healthy Hair Treatment. Active keratin contined in Souvre Internationale products, quickly restores damage hair, deeply regenerating and enhancing its protective barrier. Collagen deeply regenerates and nourishes the scalp giving your hair a healthy look and beautiful sheen. The other active ingredient, honey extract and silk, and D-panthenol have positive effects on the elasticity and vitality of yourhair. This treatment is especially recommended for people who have weak and brittle hair or hair damaged due to UV or styling treatments.
description:
NATURAL COLLAGEN GRAPHITE 100 ML, COLLAGEN SHAMPOO, COLLAGEN CONDITIONER

PROCEDURE:

Wash your hair with Collagen Shampoo. Then apply the Natural Collagen Graphite. Wrap your hair with a towel and wait 30 minutes. Next apply the Collagen Shampoo. After rinsing th shampoo with warm water, apply the Collagen Conditioner for 15 minutes. Rinse your hair.

APPLICATION:

Regeneration of your hair, reduction of hair - due to the fragility of hair.

DURATION: 50 minutes
FREQUENCY: Once a day
NUMBER OF TREATMENTS: 30

name: Rapid Result Treatment
shortDescription: A smoother, more radiant and younger looking complexion? It is possible. Get fast regenerative result that significantly firm sand nourishes your skin. Our Natural Peeling Cream contains microgranules derived from the Polynesian lagoons of natural pink sand of Tikehau that gently exfoliates your skin. Our masks contain gold and complement the desired effect as they intensely stimulate and regenerate cells, and reinforce the collagen and elastin treatment. Therefore, they provide an immediate result of firmness and intense moisturizing of the skin. Gold nourishes the skin and forms a layer that protects the skin from the effects of aging.
description:
PROCEDURE:
Wash your with the facial wash gel. Apply the Collagen Peeling Cream and massage in circular movements. Apply the gold mask and leave it for about 30 minutes. Relax and wait for fast results. We recommend to take a picture before and after the appliction.

APPLICATION:
Anti-wrinkle intensive care especially for mature and dry skin.

DURATION: 40 minutes
FREQUENCY: 1-3 a week
NUMBER OF TREATMENTS: 3

name: Strong Nails Treatment
shortDescription: Beautiful and well-groomed hands are important for everyone regardless of age. Remove blemishes and smooth the skin of your hands thanks to pink Tikehau sand and extract of aloe. Natural Collagen and elastin rebuild and strengthen your finger nails giving them a healthy look. This treatment professionally prepares your hands and nails for further treatments or manicure. Our treatment is suitable for any skin type. Frequent and regular use guarantees measurable results after just a few treatments.
description:
COLLAGEN PEELING CREAM, NATURAL COLLAGEN GRAPHITE 50 ML

PROCEDURE:
Apply and massage in the Collagen Peeling Cream. Rinse with warm water. Apply and then pat the Natural Collagen Graphite.

APPLICATION:
Intensive regeneration of damaged and weak nails.

DURATION: 15 minutes
FREQUENCY: Twice a week
NUMBER OF TREATMENTS: 50

name: Anticellulite Treatment
shortDescription: The problem of cellulite affects many women around the world. The causes of orange peel are constantly analyzed by scientists. However,the source of the problem is not clearly understood. The best weaponin the fight against the imperfections of the skin is special skin care.Our anti-cellulite treatment for active removal of orange peel acts onthe deeper layers of the skin, and also reduces stretch marks due to the addition of an effective ingredient, Liporeducyl®. Our specially selected set of products stimulates lipolysis, so that there is a distribution of fattissue. As a result, the areas around the thighs and buttocks gradually decrease and the skin becomes exceptionally firm.
description:
WASH GEL, NATURAL COLLAGEN SILVER 100 ML, COLLAGEN SLIMMING SERUM

PROCEDURE:

Wash your body with the Collagen Wash Gel. Then gently apply the Natural Collagen Silver on moist skin and pat in. Once absorbed (approx. 5-10 min.) apply and massage in the Collagen Slimming Serum.

APPLICATION:

Care of the skin affected by cellulite, reduction of orange peel, reduction of spider veins, reduction of body fat, reduction in the size of thighs and buttocks and reduction of excess water.

DURATION: 15 minutes
FREQUENCY: 1-2 a day
NUMBER OF TREATMENTS: 40

name: Refreshment and Energy Treatment for Men
shortDescription: The modern man needs special care. His skin is exposed to many harmful external factors and visible symptoms of fatigue, lack ofsleep, lack of essential vitamins and nutrients. Properly selected treatment can quickly restore softness, smoothness and healthy look.Active ingredients, such as Natural Collagen, Moist 24 and hyaluronic acid provide long-lasting and deep hydration. Additionally, Energen provides tired skin with the energy necessary for the proper functioning.
description:
COLLAGEN FACIAL WASH GEL, NATURAL COLLAGEN PLATINUM 50 ML, COLLAGEN AFTER SHAVE CREAM

PROCEDURE:

Wash your face with the facial wash gel. On moist skin gently apply and then pat the Natural Collagen Platinum. Once absorbed (approx. 5-10 min.) apply the collagen after shave cream.

APPLICATION:
Nourishes, moisturizes, restores vitality and regenerates the skin after shaving. Soothes irritation and redness.

DURATION: 15 minutes
FREQUENCY: Use after each shave
NUMBER OF TREATMENTS: 50

name: Beautiful Feet Treatment
shortDescription: Every day, you feet are exposed to many harmful external factors.They require special and systematic care. Each treatment forbeautiful feet actively influences regeneration, nourishing and moisturizing of dry and calloused skin. The presence of Natural Collagen and D-panthenol promotes the stimulation of cells andeffective regeneration. Cobiostab 400 limits the growth of bacteria responsible for unpleasant odors, which is extremely important incases of excessive sweating of the feet. Additionally, the presence of Lanolin makes the skin soft and more flexible.
description:
COLLAGEN PEELING CREAM, NATURAL COLLAGEN GRAPHITE 100 ML, FOOT REPAIR CREAM

PROCEDURE:
Apply the peeling cream and gently massage the feet in a circular motion. Rinse with warm water. On moist feet gently apply the Natural Collagen Graphite. Once absorbed (approx. 5-10 min.) apply the foot repair cream.

APPLICATION:
Intensive regeneration and hydration for feet and cracking heels. Strongly softens and hydrates your feet.

DURATION: 15 minutes

FREQUENCY: Use the treatment 2-3 times a week.
In addition, apply the foot repair cream every day.

NUMBER OF TREATMENTS: 20

name: Night Regeneration Treatment
shortDescription: At night, our skin rests after a long hard day. Therefore, it needs intensive regeneration, nutrition and support of the necessary microand macro elements that make your skin young and healthy looking.Sojadine contained in our cream soothes irritation and reduces inflammation. Well nurtured skin on the face and neck quickly regainsits vitality making it look rested, hydrated and in good condition.A simple and safe way to have beautiful skin even after a long hardday. For long-term and noticeable results we recommend applying the night treatments together with day treatment.
description:
FACIAL WASH GEL, COLLAGEN NIGHT CREAM, NATURAL COLLAGEN PLATINUM 50 ML

PROCEDURE:

Wash your face with the facial wash gel. On moist skin gently apply and then pat the Natural Collagen Platinum. Once absorbed (approx. 5-10 min.) apply the Collagen night cream.

APPLICATION:

Anti-wrinkle, regenerates and nourishes the skin of your face.

DURATION: 15 minutes
FREQUENCY: Once a day
NUMBER OF TREATMENTS: 50

name: Neck And Cleavage Regeneration Treatment
shortDescription: It is very difficult to hide the signs of aging on the neck and cleavage.The skin loses its firmness, becomes wrinkled, dry and sagging. Youneed a treatment that intensively restores elasticity and suppleness,and that will firm and nourish the skin to regain its aesthetic and youthful appearance. Thanks to Hydromanil® your skin will be substantially moisturized after just one treatment. The tretmentis cumulative and long lasting. Trylagen® effectively eradicates the signs of aging, thus providing a natural effect of smooth and elastic skin. The treatment can be used simultaneously with other treatments offered by Souvre Internationale.
description:
FACIAL WASH GEL, NATURAL COLLAGEN PLATINUM 50 ML, COLLAGEN FACE AND NECK SERUM

PROCEDURE:

Wash your neck and cleavege with the facial wash gel. On moist skin of the neck and cleavage gently apply and then pat the Natural Collagen Platinum. Once absorbed (approx. 5-10 min.) apply the Collagen Face and Neck Serum.

APPLICATION:

Anti-wrinkle, regenerates, moisturizes dry and mature skin.

DURATION: 15 minutes
FREQUENCY: Once a day
NUMBER OF TREATMENTS: 25

name: Anti-aging Day Treatment
shortDescription: This systematic treatment provides deep moisturizing,smoothing and firming the skin on the face and neck. Natural Collagen reduces the signs of aging, eliminates roughness,skin discoloration and reduces wrinkles. Thanks to, amongothers, Matrixyl® 3000, the molecules penetrate deeply intothe skin. Our treatment stimulates fibroblasts to produce morecollagen and elastin. Rich, but simple ingredients, guarantee radiant skin, a youthful appearance and gives your skina huge dose of nutrients. Your skin is prepared for the challenges of the day.
description:
FACIAL WASH GEL, COLLAGEN DAY CREAM, NATURAL COLLAGEN PLATINUM 50 ML

PROCEDURE:

Wash your face with the facial wash gel. On moist skin gently apply and then pat the Natural Collagen Platinum. Once absorbed (approx. 5-10 min.) apply the Collagen day cream.

APPLICATION:

Rejuvenation and hydration particularly for damaged skin, acne, scared and dry skin.

DURATION: 15 minutes
FREQUENCY: Once a day
NUMBER OF TREATMENTS: 50

name: Facial Cleansing Treatment
shortDescription: The primary step in skin care at any age is adequate cleaning and moisturizing. Even the best cosmetics or treatments do not fulfill that purpose if used on untreated skin. This cleansing treatment should be carried out systematically in order to remove all kinds of impurities, bacteria and excess sebum in a natural and effective way, and properly moisturizes and tones the skin. Moist 24™is responsible for exceptionally long-lasting hydration and softness, and Matrixyl® 3000 contained in Souvre Internationale products ensure optimal renewal of skin.
description:
COLLAGEN VITALIZING MILK, COLLAGEN PEELING CREAM, COLLAGEN TONER

PROCEDURE:
Clean the skin with Collagen Vitalizing Milk. Apply the Collagen Peeling Cream on your face and massage in circular motion. Rinse with hot water. Use Collagen Toner.

APPLICATION:
Cleanses, exfoliates and tones the skin.

DURATION: 5 minutes
FREQUENCY: Twice a week
NUMBER OF TREATMENTS: 50
